TEST.0.title: 2023 North Carolina Division C Regional 5
TEST.0.customHeader:
Names of participants: (Please print neatly)

 
 
 
School Name:

Check your team:  ◻ Varsity     ◻ JV1      JV2     ◻ JV3

Warning: Do not open this packet until given permission to do so.

Note: There are useful notes after this page.

CIPHER.100.cipherString: Materialism: buying things we don't need with money we don't have to impress people that don't matter.
CIPHER.100.question: The following quote has been encoded as an Aristocrat.  What does it say?

CIPHER.111.cipherString: People don't get my puns. They think they're funny.
CIPHER.111.question: A quote has been encoded using the Pollux Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 1=×, 3=●, 5=●, 7=–, 9=×

CIPHER.104.cipherString: Obsticalls aer tohes frightning thinsg that beecmoe vsiible wen we take are eyes off ar goles.
CIPHER.104.question: Your friend who can't spell or type very well is trying to offer you some advice which has then been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K1 alphabet.  What did they actually type in?

CIPHER.118.question: By solving the following cryptarithm, you should be able to decode what 2914 7035 103597 maps to.

CIPHER.121.cipherString: It is a much shallower and more ignoble occupation to detect faults than to discover beauties.
CIPHER.121.question: The following quote by Carlyle has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K1 alphabet.  What was the key phrase used to encode it?

CIPHER.109.cipherString: Never stop being kind, because everyone deserves it.
CIPHER.109.question: The following strange sentences are a Baconian cipher which encodes a quote by Debasish Mridha, M.D. that ends with ESIT.  What does it say?

CIPHER.113.cipherString: The joy of a spirit is the measure of its power.
CIPHER.113.question: A quote by Ninon de Lenclos has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 1=–×, 3=––, 5=●●, 7=×–, 9=×●

CIPHER.110.cipherString: Lo que te digas a ti mismo, en silencio o en voz alta, le dice a tu cerebro en qué enfocarte. ¡Sencillo!
CIPHER.110.question: A quote by Sam Owen has been translated to Spanish and encode as an Aristocrat using a K1 alphabet with an English keyword.  What was the Spanish translation?
CIPHER.110.translation: Whatever you say to yourself, silently or aloud, tells your brain what to focus on. Simple!

CIPHER.106.cipherString: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
CIPHER.106.question: A quote by John F. Kennedy has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. It has been encoded using a K1 alphabet.

CIPHER.112.cipherString: Science is only a Latin word for knowledge
CIPHER.112.question: A quote by Carl Sagan has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 1=●–, 2=×●, 3=●×, 4=––, 5=–×

CIPHER.123.question: Using a keywork of HUNT, encode the following phrase by Bernard Baruch with a Hill cipher.

CIPHER.117.question: Solve the following Cryptarithm and use the value to decode what 59737204 37873  stands for.

CIPHER.119.cipherString: I bought a book titled "How To Scam People Online" about three months ago... It still hasn't arrived.
CIPHER.119.question: The following quote has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K3 alphabet.  What was the key phrase used to encode the cipher?

CIPHER.124.question: Using a keyword of TOIL, decode this quote by Suzy Kassem which has been encoded as a Hill cipher.

CIPHER.116.cipherString: I like to finish other people's sentences because... my version is better.
CIPHER.116.question: The following quote needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of WORD.

CIPHER.102.cipherString: The dream was always running ahead of me. To catch up, to live for a moment in unison, was the miracle.
CIPHER.102.question: A quote by Anaïs Nin has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K1 alphabet.  What did they say?

CIPHER.114.cipherString: If life is a journey, It can take you anywhere you wanna go.
CIPHER.114.question: A quote by Christina Aguilera has been encoded using the Fractionated Morse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with IFLI.

CIPHER.105.cipherString: Even if ninety-nine percent of what you discover is later proven wrong, it is the one percent that is right that matters.
CIPHER.105.question: The following quote by Steven Magee has been encoded as a Patristocrat using a K2 alphabet.  What did he say?

CIPHER.120.cipherString: In this thing one man is superior to another, that he is better able to bear adversity and prosperity.
CIPHER.120.question: A quote by Philemon has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K1 key phrase.  What was the key phrase used to encode the cipher?

CIPHER.115.cipherString: The secret of all victory lies in the organization of the non-obvious.
CIPHER.115.question: The following quote by Marcus Aurelius needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of WHAT

CIPHER.101.cipherString: My best mates and I played a game of hiding and seek. It went on for hours... Well, good friends are hard to find.
CIPHER.101.question: A quote has been encoded as an Aristocrat for you to solve.  What does it say?

CIPHER.107.cipherString: The best way to have a good idea is to have a lot of ideas.
CIPHER.107.question: The following words encode an observation by Linus Pauling in a Baconian Ciper.  What did they say?

CIPHER.103.cipherString: A mathematician believes that describing the speed of Mercury with equations amounts to science.
CIPHER.103.question: A quote by Bill Gaede has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K2 alphabet.  What did he say?

CIPHER.108.cipherString: I got a job in a health club, but they said I wasn't fit for the job.
CIPHER.108.question: The following symbols are a Baconian cipher which encode an interesting quote.  What did they say?

CIPHER.122.cipherString: To be a tremendous success, look for opportunity rather than security.
CIPHER.122.question: A quote by Debasish Debha, M.D. has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 5 rails were used to encode it.
